__e: I have had plenty of time to reflect on my deeds in the White House.
You gave that kid stock and told him when to sell it.
Why? You have more people to tell about the stock thing?
Yes, but in the feeling good ledger of life, we are rich indeed.
The company stock is at an all-time low.
Besides, he's got an 80 percent stake in the club.
Anyone who has our stock will triple their money.
You agree with everything that is being said on your behalf, that you are not responsible for what your father did?
It's in us and in our actions on this day.
I mean, your actions have ramifications.
You kids have got to learn that actions have consequences.
Well, it's important to realize that your actions have consequences.
Your return is exactly what our stock price needs.
I know my actions hurt a lot of people--
I remember you once said that my actions matter and that it's not water under the bridge.
You do that stuff with the stocks and the money and, uh...
And when I look into the face of another bad man, I see his deeds and I know his fucking soul.
The fact is, maybe I could use a little time to reflect on my actions and what got me here.
His actions have honored all of us.
Perhaps his actions are a kind of justice, for who destroys more of the green than your kind?
His actions fired the bullet that killed him, and your mother.
- Look, the truth of the matter is... I could sell you more than 100 shares... and feel completely comfortable about the trade.
I think it's a little too much too soon, and,judging by the drop in amerimart's stock prices, I would say that the public would take my side.
Two good deeds in one day for something that size... we ought to be caught up on our good deeds for a year.
